original_title: GMOA sounds alarm; at least 2,500 Dengue cases every week
original_body_lines: The Government Medical Officers’ Association (GMOA) warned that at least 2,500 cases of Dengue are being reported across the island every week.
“This indicates that 2023 will record the highest number of Dengue cases in comparison to the last few years,” GMOA Secretary Dr. Haritha Aluthge said.
